commands.name: generate-contact-api
commands.description: Generates the backend API for managing contacts

commands.name: generate-contact-form
commands.description: Generates the frontend form for managing contacts

commands.name: connect-api-ui
commands.description: Connects the frontend to the backend

commands.name: setup-git-and-push
commands.description: Initializes the Git repo, creates .gitignore, commits files, and pushes to GitHub
commands.command: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit' && git branch -M main && git remote add origin <your-repo-url> && git push -u origin main
